myunfinishedlyf: One of the biggest sugar contents is aerated drinks - I stopped drinking aerated drinks like coke Pepsi in grade 10th, round the time I was going into teenage years properly, it saved me from lot of skin related problems, so that’s my advice for anyone asking to reduce sugar, just cut of the aerated drinks
